description: Professor Hass is a family-owned agribusiness, focused on avocado cultivation and oil extraction in Colombia. The company aims to support farmers of all scales by providing knowledge and resources to enhance their agricultural practices and increase their income. The initiative also includes educational tourism, where visitors can learn about avocado farming and the oil extraction process, thereby generating additional income for the business. Overall, Professor Hass seeks to transform the Colombian agricultural landscape by promoting high-quality, organic products and fostering a community of informed and empowered farmers.
name: Professor Hass
